0.Pros: Easiest Job, Easy Money , Not hard work

1.Pros: The hours were nice, I worked during the day and no weekends. It was close to home and I was able to go home for lunch.
1.Cons: I never really did finish some of the things I was suppose to do and got blamed for some things that I didn't do.

2.Pros: - Relatively easy tasks- Always hiring and usually accept all applicants- Easy money
2.Cons: - No one cares about training new hires, 75% of staff weren't even properly trained.- Management didn't bat an eyelash when I was physically assaulted on the McDonald's property on shift, they said "Oh that happens sometimes."- Most employees didn't handle food safely.- Full of high schoolers and high school drama- Management cussed at employees- EXTREMELY RUDE CUSTOMERS (probably because McDonalds' customer service is about as good as an uncooked potato)

3.Pros: There are flexible hours, they pay well hourly, and its a nice working environment. And they also give courtesies(Using the restroom) whenever you need it.
3.Cons: I had to take a medical leave, and they didn't let me back on the schedule, even though I put on there that I could work certain hours and certain days.

4.Pros: It is fun at times. Can be a little bit challenging at times.Training is okay. Time flies if you are busy.
4.Cons: Pay and hours can suck. Better to be a manager. No benefits and it can be stressful at times.

5.Pros: It was what you would expect it to be. Nothing out of the ordinary. That is about all I can say about it.
5.Cons: No no no no no no no no no no no no no no no no no no no no no no no no no no no

6.Pros: Work hard and play hard organization. Family friendly with good benefits. Reasonably good career mobility.
6.Cons: Extremely political. Culture has changed much from McDonald's glory days.

7.Pros: Good pay with flexible schedules. You eat free and get free uniforms. A paid 15 minute break.
7.Cons: I hate when we are shirt staffed or have a staff full of new people. It drives me insane.

8.Pros: Fantastic people that made the day interesting
8.Cons: Repetitive work in a fast food restaurant

9.Pros: Wicked easy job, everyone I work with is really nice and we're all friends.
9.Cons: Some of the customers can be really rude and entitled. Also it can be high pressure during a rush but don't let it discourage you!!!
